akn:section.akn:heading: Eligibility: denial upon certain punitive discharges or dismissals

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 12740. Eligibility: denial upon certain punitive discharges or dismissals A person who—(1) is convicted of an offense under the Uniform Code of Military Justice (chapter 47 of this title) and whose sentence includes death; or
(2) is separated pursuant to sentence of a court-martial with a dishonorable discharge, a bad conduct discharge, or (in the case of an officer) a dismissal,
is not eligible for retired pay under this chapter. (Added Pub. L. 104–106, div. A, title VI, § 632(a)(1), Feb. 10, 1996, 110 Stat. 365.)
